patthana21.41:4.1: Nasanidassanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:4.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.41:5.1: Nasanidassanaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:5.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.41:6.1: Nasanidassanaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:6.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
